org.openintents.tools.simulator.view

类 SensorsScenarioView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.openintents.tools.simulator.view.SensorsScenarioView
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SensorsScenarioView
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    SensorsScenarioView is represented by the "Scenario Simulator" tab. It contains: a detailed view for the selected state for editing the scenario items in a grid a playbar that covers data regarding dynamic state of the scenario buttons for control the actions over the scenario (create, load, save, record)
    作者:
    ilarele
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • addView

        public void addView(int position,
                    StateViewSmall stateView)
        Adds the view to the scenario, compute pixels per position for mTimeBar and update scroll position to the new added state.
        参数:
        position - of the new added view
        stateView - the new view to be add in the scenario

      • showBigView

        public void showBigView(StateModel model,
                        StateViewSmall smallView)
        Sets the model for the detailed view.
        参数:
        model - based on which to create the detail view
        smallView - used to know if we should clean the detailed view when deleting a certain state.

      • updateScrollPosition

        public void updateScrollPosition()
        Updates mHScrollBar value to the current state from the model, taking into account the number of items in the scenario and pixels per position.
